name: Emir
tagline: eMir is the next-generation display server technology.
body:
emir - enhanced cross-platform display manager
==============================================

eMir is a display manager that provides efficient support for graphics coprocessors.
eMir was forked from http://launchpad.net/mir as the '-ng' version of Canonical's Mir.

For the rationale behind the fork, and why a Mir-based solution is superior to existing technology (e.g. X11, Wayland) please see the [Announcing-eMir] page on the [wiki].

[Announcing-eMir]: http://github.com/eMir-server/eMir/wiki/Announcing-eMir
[wiki]: http://github.com/eMir-server/eMir/wiki/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
